settings.info: Unique configuration to separate store instances by user location. Use [ISO 3166 standard](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_3166-2) to define country and continent codes.

settings.label: Store code
settings.info: Enter a unique store code for the store.

settings.label: Store name
settings.info: Enter a unique store name for the store.

settings.label: Enable href lang support
settings.info: Edit store href values in /snippets/site-href-lang.liquid. [More information](https://moz.com/learn/seo/hreflang-tag)
Insert here a iubenda script for different language/Store.
Update the logo displayed in the header.

settings.label: Enable product reviews
settings.info: Show Shopify review badges and content on product cards and product page.

settings.label: Enable currency converter
settings.info: Use Fixer.io currency conversion rates. Disable if using Shopify Multi-Currency.

settings.label: Enable currency selector
settings.info: Show a currency selector in the site footer. Currency converter must be enabled if Shopify Multi-Currency is not enabled.

settings.label: Enable free shipping notification
settings.info: Show in product page a free shipping notification (fix value).

settings.label: Enable free shipping notification
settings.info: Show in cart page a free shipping notification based on cart value.

settings.label: Free shipping threshold value
settings.info: Minimum value for free delivery. Value must be in cents.

settings.label: Inventory quantity threshold
settings.info: Display notification in PDP when variant reaches below this threshold. (Inclusive)

settings.label: Enable product swatches
settings.info: Enable clickable product options on product form.

settings.label: Enable image zoom
settings.info: Enable zoom on hover on featured image.

settings.label: Enable free gift with purchase
settings.info: Add a free product to the cart automatically, if enabled and order total is greater than the amounts set below

settings.label: First free gift product
settings.info: Product to be added to the cart

settings.label: First free gift minimum cart value - Lower Threshold Value
settings.info: Minimum cart value that must be reached before the first free gift is added to the cart, e.g. 1000 is 10.00

settings.label: First free gift quantity
settings.info: Quantity of free gift product added to cart when the threshold is met

settings.label: Second free gift product
settings.info: Product to be added to the cart

settings.label: Second free gift minimum cart value - Higher Threshold Value
settings.info: Minimum cart value that must be reached before the free gift is added to the cart, e.g. 5000 is 50.00 - Leave blank if only one free gift is required

settings.label: Second free gift quantity
settings.info: Quantity of free gift product added to cart when the threshold is met

settings.label: Show cart add-on
settings.info: Show add-on option on the cart page.

settings.label: Show cart add-on message
settings.info: Show add-on message when checkbox is checked.

settings.label: Add-on product
settings.info: Product to add to the user's cart when the checkbox is checked.

settings.label: Loqate store key
settings.info: Enter a unique loqate key for the store.

settings.label: List ID
settings.info: Locating the List ID from Klaviyo: https://help.klaviyo.com/hc/en-us/articles/115005078647-Find-a-List-ID

settings.label: Verification ID
settings.info: This is the long ID within the 'content' part of the meta tag

settings.label: Promo tag, utilize it for line-items property. Insert Tag product bundle

settings.info: Insert from/to hours.

settings.label: Image

A simple favicon can increase engagement and bring users back to your site.

settings.label: Favicon image
settings.info: Recommended upload size at 512 x 512px.

settings.label: Application Colour
settings.info: Theme color applied on Android and Window users' mobile browsers.

settings.info: This image will be replaced on the Gift Card redemption page generated in the email.
